title: Absolute Beginner
description: A guided course teaching you basic structures through stories. For absolute beginners with no experience in Te Reo.

title: Beginner
description: An introduction to more advanced concepts. For learners with some experience in Te Reo.

title: Intermediate
description: Stories which use descriptive language and less common words. For learners looking to expand their vocabulary
